attributes.action: Petition for Mike Ward to be GGCC second team captain.
attributes.additional_details: GGCC second team needs help. Only 2 wins last season. We need more and Mike can give us more.
attributes.background: GGCC needs your help to get Mike Ward back as the second team captain.

rejection.details: Decisions about the team captains of sports teams are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
